src_segment: The giant panda also known as the panda bear (or simply the panda), is a bear native to South Central China.
tgt_segment: El panda gigante, también conocido como oso panda (o simplemente panda), es un oso nativo del centro sur de China.

src_segment: The giant panda also known as the panda bear (or simply the panda), is a bear native to South Central China.

src_segment: The giant panda also known as the panda bear (or simply the panda), is a bear native to South Central China.

src_segment: The giant panda also known as the panda bear (or simply the panda), is a bear native to South Central China.
tgt_segment: El panda gigante, también conocido como oso panda (o simplemente panda), es un oso nativo del centro sur de China.

src_segment: It is characterised by its bold black-and-white coat and rotund body.
tgt_segment: Se caracteriza por su llamativo pelaje blanco y negro, y su cuerpo robusto.

src_segment: The name "giant panda" is sometimes used to distinguish it from the red panda, a neighboring musteloid.
tgt_segment: El nombre "panda gigante" se usa a veces para distinguirlo del panda rojo, un musteloide similar.

src_segment: The name "giant panda" is sometimes used to distinguish it from the red panda, a neighboring musteloid.
tgt_segment: El nombre "panda gigante" se usa a veces para distinguirlo del panda rojo, un musteloide similar.

src_segment: The name "giant panda" is sometimes used to distinguish it from the red panda, a neighboring musteloid.
tgt_segment: El nombre "panda gigante" se usa a veces para distinguirlo del panda rojo, un musteloide similar.

src_segment: Though it belongs to the order Carnivora, the giant panda is a folivore, with bamboo leaves and shoots making up more than 99% of its diet.
tgt_segment: Aunque pertenece al orden Carnivora, el panda gigante es un folívoro; más del 99 % de su dieta consiste en brotes y hojas de bambú.

src_segment: Giant pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses, wild tubers, or even meat in the form of birds, rodents, or carrion.
tgt_segment: En la naturaleza, los pandas gigantes comen ocasionalmente otras hierbas, tubérculos silvestres o incluso carne en forma de aves, roedores o carroña.

src_segment: In captivity, they may receive honey, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, or bananas along with specially prepared food.
tgt_segment: En cautiverio, pueden alimentarse de miel, huevos, pescado, ñame, hojas de arbustos, naranjas o plátanos, además de alimentos preparados.

src_segment: In captivity, they may receive honey, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, or bananas along with specially prepared food.
tgt_segment: En cautiverio, pueden alimentarse de miel, huevos, pescado, ñame, hojas de arbustos, naranjas o plátanos, además de alimentos preparados.

src_segment: The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges in central China, mainly in Sichuan, but also in neighbouring Shaanxi and Gansu.
tgt_segment: El panda gigante vive en algunas cadenas montañosas en el centro de China, principalmente en Sichuan, pero también en las ciudades cercanas de Shaanxi y Gansu.

src_segment: As a result of farming, deforestation, and other development, the giant panda has been driven out of the lowland areas where it once lived, and it is a conservation-reliant vulnerable species.
tgt_segment: Como resultado de la agricultura, la deforestación y otros desarrollos, el panda gigante ha sido desplazado de las zonas de baja altitud que habitaba, y es una especie vulnerable que depende de la conservación.

src_segment: For many decades, the precise taxonomic classification of the giant panda was under debate because it shares characteristics with both bears and raccoons.
tgt_segment: Durante muchas décadas, se debatió la clasificación taxonómica precisa del panda gigante porque comparte características tanto con los osos como con los mapaches.

src_segment: However, molecular studies indicate the giant panda is a true bear, part of the family Ursidae.
tgt_segment: Sin embargo, los estudios moleculares indican que el panda gigante es un oso auténtico, miembro de la familia Ursidae.

src_segment: These studies show it diverged about 19 million years ago from the common ancestor of the Ursidae
tgt_segment: Estos estudios muestran que se separó hace unos 19 millones de años del ancestro común de los Ursidae.

src_segment: The giant panda has been referred to as a living fossil.
tgt_segment: Se ha hecho referencia al panda gigante como un fósil viviente.
